body.p: This map uses a separate key definition submap. In addition, each navigation topicref uses @keyref to point to the topic it uses.

Note that in the 1.8.5 and 2.x before 2.1ish OTs, there is a bug in that @copy-to on a topicref that uses keyref to point to its ultimate target will not work in that the copy-to doesn't get applied to the keyref-referenced topic. However, the adjust-copy-to processing has the effect of fixing this when the copy-to attribute is updated because the map is processed twice on the second time the keyref-provided URLs have been added to the navigation topicrefs.
